message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I can't go as low as $160, I'm willing to come down a bit to $180. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll get great value from it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $180 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $170. That's the highest I can go, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
